title: Massive JVP protest in Nugegoda on Wednesday (23) afternoon
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The ‘Jana Bala Virodaya’ protest march and rally organized by the National People’s Power will be held in Nugegoda on Wednesday (23) afternoon.
This protest is held against the Government for its failure to control the rising cost of living and demanding to solve the economic crisis.
The protest march will start from Delkanda Town at 3 PM and will proceed to Nugegoda.
“I opposed to searching women in Hijab’ – Ranil reveals events on Easter Sunday
